# OptionArgFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool OptionArgFunc(string option_name, string value, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| option_name | Transfer ownership: none |
| value | Transfer ownership: none |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
